trans-unit.source: Represents a command in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> ASP.NET mobile control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> ASP.NET 行動控制項的命令。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand> object can be declared as a `<command>` element within the declaration of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand>物件可以宣告為`<command>`的宣告中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand> object can be also constructed, and added programmatically to an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>, by adding it to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A> member collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand>物件可以也建構，並以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>，將它加入至控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A>成員集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand>物件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger, more complete example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是一個較大且更完整範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>概觀。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />，權限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all properties to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式會初始化所有的屬性，以`null`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Name" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: The second constructor uses the name and text parameters to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 第二個建構函式會使用名稱和文字參數來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the command.
trans-unit.target: 取得命令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name is provided in the event that is generated when the user selects a command.
trans-unit.target: 使用者選取命令時，會產生的事件中，提供的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is to appear in the command.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要出現在命令中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: The text that is to appear in the command.
trans-unit.target: 要出現在命令中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text%2A> property can be specified by using the `Text` attribute, or as inner text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text%2A>屬性可以指定使用`Text`屬性，或為內部文字。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text%2A> property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text%2A>屬性已指定這兩種方式中，內部文字一定會優先。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text%2A> property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the newly set property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommand.Text%2A>屬性以程式設計方式設定時，內部文字會自動移除和設定新屬性會優先。
